sigils.Mighty Leap: This card blocks opposing Airborne creatures
sigils.Bifurcated Strike: This card will strike each opposing space to the left and right of the spaces across it
sigils.Trifurcated Strike: This card will deal damage to the opposing spaces left, right, and opposite of it
sigils.Frozen Away: When this card perishes, the creature inside takes its place.
sigils.Steel Trap: When this card dies, the card opposing it also dies. A Wolf Pelt is created in your hand.
sigils.Rabbit Hole: When this card is played, a Rabbit is created in your hand.
sigils.Sprinter: At the end of the owner's turn, this card will move in the sigil's direction
sigils.Touch of Death: This card instantly kills any card it damages
sigils.Fledgling: After surviving for 1 turn, this card grows into a stronger form.
sigils.Burrower: This card will move to any empty space that is attacked by an enemy to block it
sigils.Fecundity: When this card is played, a copy of it enters your hand.
sigils.Bone King: When this card dies, 4 Bones are awarded instead of 1.
sigils.Unkillable: When this card perishes, a copy of it enters your hand
sigils.Sharp Quills: Once this card is struck, the striker is dealt 1 damage
sigils.Hefty: At the end of the owner's turn, this and adjacent cards move in the sigil's direction
sigils.Guardian: When an opposing card is played opposite an empty space, this card moves to that space
sigils.Airborne: This card will ignore opposing cards and strike an opponent directly
sigils.Many Lives: When this card is sacrificed, it does not perish.
sigils.Repulsive: If a creature would attack this card, it does not
sigils.Worthy Sacrifice: This card counts as 3 Blood rather than 1 Blood when sacrificed.
sigils.Bone Digger: At the end of the owner's turn, this card generates 1 Bone
sigils.Skeleton Crew: At the end of the owner's turn, this card moves in the sigil's direction and plays a Skeleton in the space behind it.
sigils.Green Mox: While this card is on the board, it provides a Green Gem
sigils.Orange Mox: While this card is on the board, it provides an Orange Gem
sigils.Blue Mox: While this card is on the board, it provides a Blue Gem
sigils.Gem Animator: Mox cards on the owner's side of the board gain 1 Power.
sigils.Ruby Heart: When this card perishes, a Ruby Mox replaces it.
sigils.Mental Gemnastics: When this card is played, you draw cards equal to the amount of your Mox cards played.
sigils.Gem Dependant: If this card's owner controls no Mox cards, this card perishes.
sigils.Great Mox: While this card is on the board, it provides all 3 Gems to its owner.
sigils.Handy: When this card is played, discard your hand then draw 4 cards.
sigils.Squirrel Shedder: At the end of the owner's turn, this card moves in the sigil's direction and plays a Squirrel in the space behind it.
sigils.Attack Conduit: Other creatures within a circuit completed by this card gain 1 Power
sigils.Spawn Conduit: Empty spaces in a circuit created by this card play L33pB0ts at the end of the owner's turn.
sigils.Null Conduit: This card may complete a circuit, but provides no effect
sigils.Battery Bearer: When this card is played, you gain an Energy Cell
sigils.Detonator: When this card dies, adjacent and opposing cards are dealt 10 damage
sigils.Sentry: When a creature moves into the space opposite this card, they take 1 damage
sigils.Energy Conduit: If this card is part of a completed circuit, your Energy never depletes.
sigils.Bomb Spewer: When this card is played, fill all empty spaces with Explode Bots.
sigils.Double Death: When another creature you own dies, it dies again.
sigils.Power Dice: Activate: Pay 1 Energy to set the Power of this card randomly between 1 and 6.
sigils.Enlarge: Activate: Pay 2 Bones to increase the Power and Health of this card by 1.
sigils.Disentomb: Activate: Pay 1 Bone to create a Skeleton in your hand.
sigils.Energy Gun: Activate: Pay 1 Energy to deal 1 damage to the space across from this card.
sigils.Looter: When this card deals damage directly, draw a card for each damage dealt.
sigils.True Scholar: Activate: If you have a Blue gem, destroy this card to draw 3 cards.
sigils.Stimulate: Activate: Pay 3 Energy to increase the Power and Health of this card by 1.
sigils.Bonehorn: Activate: Pay 1 Energy to gain 3 Bones.
sigils.Waterborne: On the opponent's turn, creatures attacking this card's space attack directly.
sigils.Kraken Waterborne: Same as Waterborne, except that this card becomes a Tentacle card when it emerges.
sigils.Bees Within: When this card is struck, a Bee is created in your hand.
sigils.Dam Builder: When this card is played, Dams are created on adjacent empty spaces.
sigils.Hoarder: When this card is played, choose a card from your deck to be drawn immediately.
sigils.Loose Tail: When this card would be struck, a tail is created in its place and this card moves to the right.
sigils.Corpse Eater: If a card that you own dies by combat, this card is played from your hand on its space.
sigils.Ant Spawner: When this card is played, an Ant enters your hand.
sigils.Trinket Bearer: When this card is played, you will receive an item if you have room.
sigils.Amorphous: When this card is drawn, this sigil is replaced by a random sigil
sigils.Tidal Lock: At the beginning of its owner's turn, this card will remove all Squirrels and Rabbits from the board.
sigils.Omni Strike: This card will strike all opposing creatures, or attack directly if there are none.
sigils.Leader: Creatures adjacent to this card gain 1 Power.
sigils.Bellist: When this card is played, Chimes are created on adjacent empty spaces.
sigils.Stinky: The creature opposing this card loses 1 Power
sigils.Sniper: You may choose which opposing spaces this card strikes
sigils.Nano Armor: The first time this card would take damage, prevent it
sigils.Overclocked: This card has 1 additional Power, but its removed from your deck if it dies
sigils.Bomb Latch: When this card perishes, give a card the Detonator sigil
sigils.Brittle Latch: When this card perishes, give a card the Brittle sigil
sigils.Shield Latch: When this card perishes, give a card the Nano Armor sigil
sigils.Dead Byte: When this card perishes, select a file and deal damage proportional to its size
sigils.Hostage File: When this card perishes, the file used to create it is deleted
sigils.Transformer: At the start of your turn, this card toggles its Beast mode
sigils.Gem Guardian: When this card is played, all Gem Vessels on the owner's side gain Nano Armor
sigils.Vessel Printer: When this card is struck, draw an Empty Vessel
sigils.Swapper: After this card is dealt damage, swap its Power and Health
sigils.Annoying: The creature opposing this card gains 1 Power
sigils.Gem Spawn Conduit: Empty spaces in a circuit created by this card play Gem Vessels at the end of the owner's turn
sigils.Gift Bearer: When this card perishes, gain a random card
sigils.Buff When Powered: If this card is inside a circuit, it gains 2 Power
sigils.Gift When Powered: If this card is inside a circuit when it perishes, gain a random card
sigils.Trifurcated When Powered: If this card is within a circuit, it will deal damage to the opposing spaces left, right, and opposite of it
sigils.Clinger: When you play another card, this card moves as close as possible to it
sigils.Brood Parasite: When a card bearing this sigil is played, an egg is created on the opposing space
sigils.Rampager: At the end of the owner's turn, this card will move in the direction on the sigil. Cards in the way will replace where it was previously
sigils.Made of Stone: A card bearing this sigil is immune to the effects of Touch of Death and Stinky
sigils.Double Strike: A card bearing this sigil will strike the opposing space an extra time when attacking
sigils.Blood Lust: When this card kills an opposing card, it gains 1 Power
sigils.Morsel: When this card is sacrificed, it transfers its stats onto the card it was sacrificed for
sigils.Armored: The first time a card bearing this sigil would take damage, prevent that damage
sigils.Scavenger: While this card is played, opposing cards also grant Bones upon death
sigils.Finical Hatchling: This card hatches when drawn if all lights on the egg are lit up. These correspond to the Power, Health, and Tribe of your deck
